modName: Hellcommanders new spells Tweaks plus Additions
summary: Made it so buff spells effect summons and such, adds new spells, does a little renaming, tweaks some spells, makes the drainspell bow \"disenchantable\" by smithing into unenchanted version, adds command spells. plus much more
descriptionHtml:
Uploading so people can use if they want if you don\'t want to download then it is your chose to make
If you like my mod please endorse no need to vote use the voting on the bigger mods :P
credit goes to author of skyedit for his/her wonderful new tool
this mode is very much still in the beta stages but so far things seem to work
put this in the data directory of skyrim\'s location
sorry for rough description plus don\'t have much a readme yet
rough list of changes

new command spells not working currently new to be able to edit script to fix :(

credits to uesp.net and author of skyedit tool,TESsnipe
new spell mend the dead
new spell command greater daedra
new spell command animal
new spell command greater animal
new spell command greater animals
new spell greater Telekiness
new spell greater mayhem
new spell poison spit
new spell poison spray
new spell poison orb
new spell poison stream
new spell lights up
new spell improved candlelight
go to tanning rack to make the new spells
tweaked banish description to displace the magnitude
tweaked call to arms so it can effect anything you control, raise, or summon
renamed command to command daedra so its more accurately named
tweaked command daedra\'s description to show the magnitude of the effect
tweaked confidence effects to affect anything you control, raise, or summon
tweaked mayham and hysteria to hopefully not effect teammates or dungeon followers
command daedra no longer has a infinite duration lasts 2 minutes now
recipe for a unenchanted drainspell bow (hint save those soulgem fragments and get arcane blacksmith perk) now upgradable
recipe for bow that adds stagger to shot test item (same req to make as elven and needs arcane blacksmith)
recipes for expermental projectile glass arrows
author: Hellcommander711
